item.title: Recreating the Doctor Who Time Tunnel in GLSL
item.description: The slit-scan effect is a classic analog special effect used in the “Stargate” sequence in 2001: A Space Odyssey, and a title sequence in Doctor Who. It turns out this effect is easy to implement, and the transformation can be done in only a few lines of code.
